Issue.creator: tolak
Issue.summary: Uneffective assignment of "CORE_PEER_MSPCONFIGPATH" at setGlobals() in file script.sh(e2e_cli)
Issue.description: At function setGlobals() in file examples/e2e_cli/scripts/script.sh, the assignment flow of env variable "CORE_PEER_MSPCONFIGPATH" is a bit of uneffective.
